omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select
		NHS_Number,
		Regimen,
		Drug_Name,
		Actual_Dose_Per_Administration,
		Administration_Measurement_Per_Actual_Dose,
		Administration_Date
	from omop_staging.sact_staging

omopColumns.name: drug_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Maps concepts to standard valid concepts in the `drug` domain.

omopColumns.name: drug_exposure_start_date

dataSource.name: Administration_Date
dataSource.description: SYSTEMIC ANTI-CANCER THERAPY ADMINISTRATION DATE is the date of the Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy Drug Administration or the date an oral drug was initially dispensed to the PATIENT.

omopColumns.query:
select
		NHS_Number,
		Regimen,
		Drug_Name,
		Actual_Dose_Per_Administration,
		Administration_Measurement_Per_Actual_Dose,
		Administration_Date
	from omop_staging.sact_staging

omopColumns.name: drug_exposure_end_date

dataSource.name: Administration_Date
dataSource.description: SYSTEMIC ANTI-CANCER THERAPY ADMINISTRATION DATE is the date of the Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy Drug Administration or the date an oral drug was initially dispensed to the PATIENT.

omopColumns.query:
select
		NHS_Number,
		Regimen,
		Drug_Name,
		Actual_Dose_Per_Administration,
		Administration_Measurement_Per_Actual_Dose,
		Administration_Date
	from omop_staging.sact_staging

omopColumns.name: drug_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32818`. `EHR administration record`

omopColumns.name: drug_source_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Maps concepts to standard valid concepts in the `drug` domain.

omopColumns.name: drug_source_value

dataSource.name: Drug_Name
dataSource.description: The name of the Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy drug given to a PATIENT during an Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy Drug Regimen.

omopColumns.query:
select
		NHS_Number,
		Regimen,
		Drug_Name,
		Actual_Dose_Per_Administration,
		Administration_Measurement_Per_Actual_Dose,
		Administration_Date
	from omop_staging.sact_staging

omopColumns.name: dose_unit_source_value
omopColumns.operation_description: The UNIT OF MEASUREMENT used for each Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy Drug Administration in a Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy Drug Cycle.

dataSource.name: Administration_Measurement_Per_Actual_Dose
dataSource.description: The UNIT OF MEASUREMENT used for each Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy Drug Administration in a Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy Drug Cycle.

omopColumns.query:
select
		NHS_Number,
		Regimen,
		Drug_Name,
		Actual_Dose_Per_Administration,
		Administration_Measurement_Per_Actual_Dose,
		Administration_Date
	from omop_staging.sact_staging
omopColumns.lookup_table_markdown:
|Administration_Measurement_Per_Actual_Dose|dose_unit_source_value|notes|
|------|-----|-----|
|01|Milligrams (mg)||
|02|Micrograms (Mcg)||
|03|Grams (g)||
|04|Units||
|05|Cells||
|06|Plaque Forming Units (PFU) (one million) (x10^6)||
|07|Plaque Forming Units (PFU) (one hundred million) (x10^8)||
